nodes.bodyText:
@ryanjdew I don't know enough to know the impact here. Thoughts?
I see that the code prior to the latest change was this:
return
        if (fn:count($queries) gt 1) then
          helper-impl:group-queries-by-scope($queries, cts:and-query#1)
        else
          $queries

And is now this:
return
        let $queries := if (fn:count($queries) gt 1) then
          helper-impl:group-queries-by-scope($queries, cts:and-query#1)
        else
          $queries
        return
          if (fn:count($queries) gt 1) then
            cts:and-query($queries)
          else
            $queries

So this looks like a new line of code. I just don't know whether "or" or "and" is the right choice here.
nodes.diffHunk:
@@ -303,7 +303,7 @@ declare function match-impl:find-document-matches-by-options(
           $queries
         return
           if (fn:count($queries) gt 1) then
-            cts:and-query($queries)
+            cts:or-query($queries)
